channel.title: [317] all spirit shield cfg [317]
channel.description:
I was wondering if any of you might know the stats for all the spirit shields for the item.cfg?
I would rep if I could.
[b]Off Topic Below[/b]
New server being released soon! Percent of completion below.
45% Complete. 1 [b]I[/b] = 5% complete.
[b]IIIIIIIII[/b]IIIIIIIIIII
